metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000415 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: MatrixSSL version 3.7.2 has an incorrect UTCTime date range validation in its X.509 certificate validation process resulting in some certificates have their expiration (beginning) year extended (delayed) by 100 years.

criterions.comment: matrixssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
